item.title: CVE-2024-33628|2024-06-04T13:15:07.051Z -- XforWooCommerce -- XforWooCommerce
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in XforWooCommerce allows PHP Local File Inclusion.This issue affects XforWooCommerce: from n/a through 2.0.2.
